title: Hey, I'm Eric Song
tagline: Designing resilient systems and capturing stories through photography.
introduction: I'm a junior at UCLA studying Computer Engineering and a photography hobbyist exploring how thoughtful technology can empower people. I love building immersive digital experiences and documenting the world through my lens.
aboutBody: From collaborative classroom projects to freelance shoots around Los Angeles, I balance engineering rigor with artistic curiosity. I'm passionate about architecting reliable systems, experimenting with new camera techniques, and sharing knowledge with my community.

highlights.title: Hands-on Engineering
highlights.description: Designing embedded solutions and experimenting with IoT systems that bridge software with hardware.

highlights.title: Visual Storytelling
highlights.description: Curating photo collections that celebrate people and places, blending color theory with technical lighting.

highlights.title: Collaborative Growth
highlights.description: Building inclusive teams, mentoring peers, and shipping projects that make technology approachable.

contactBody: I'm currently seeking internships, project partnerships, and creative collaborations. If you're exploring something exciting, I'd love to hear more.
